Summary



NBCC bags Rs 3,200 crore project from the finance ministryGranules India QIP opens; floor price set at Rs 127.63 per shareReliance Capital says Reliance Home Finance to list on September 22NPPA fixes ceiling price of 39 more drug formulationsYes Bank ex-date for 5:1 stock split. F&O lot size revised to 1,750






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, declined 0.24 percent to 10,143 as of 7:40 a.m.

title: Stocks To Watch: Bank Of Baroda, Reliance Capital,  NBCC India, Novartis
